subtitle: Convert between pixel, rem, and em units — perfect for responsive and accessible web design.

usage.title: Responsive Design:
usage.description: REM and EM units scale with the user's browser settings, improving accessibility.

usage.title: Typography:
usage.description: Designers use EM for spacing and font sizes that adapt to the context element.

usage.title: CSS Layouts:
usage.description: PX is often used for precision, while REM ensures proportional scaling.

funFactsTitle: Fun Facts About PX, REM & EM

funFacts.title: Accessibility:
funFacts.description: Using REM makes text easier to scale when users change browser zoom or default font size.

funFacts.title: Nested Scaling:
funFacts.description: EM values multiply based on their parent’s font size, making them powerful but tricky!
